answers.answer: I'm not a Dr or a nurse but I'll try to help if I can. Are you able to orgasm with a partner, and not while masturbating? Or, is the problem that you can't orgasm at all?

i am finding it diffecult to get hard and i don orgasm at all if alone or when i do it so want to know if i went to a nurse can they actually help i get bad headaches due to pent up tention and frustration

Do you have any medical problems or are you on any medications? I'm asking because either of these can cause the problem you're having.If this is not the case then I recommend you see your Dr for some testing. They will check your hormones and do some other testing.
they check me already and only been like it last 6 months
By "check" you do you mean tests?You did'nt say if you're on any medications. Are you?Did anything happen around 6 months ago like a break up with a partner, anything you can think of?
We do have "Ask a Dr Forum" here at Medhelp but there is no sexual health forum there.We have a Mens Health forum here so you might also want to post your question there to get more responses.

Sex therapists do not do "hands on" .If you are having an erectile dysfunction, you should make an appointment with your doctor to do a blood test to check your hormone levels.  And also go through any medications that you are taking.If you suffer from diabetes, you already may have nerve damage.  Other medications can also affect libido and performance.

title: i cant ***
